question: Which mountain is the highest peak within the limits of Kanazawa City, Japan?
asked_question_translated: Katera gora je najvišji vrh na območju mesta Kanazawa na Japonskem?
answer: Najvišji vrh na območju mesta Kanazawa na Japonskem je gora Haku (Hakusan).
answer_translated_eng: The highest peak in the Kanazawa area of Japan is Mount Haku (Hakusan).
